name: The Crawling Man
description:
Introduction

This is a first-person horror game that aims to escape from the dungeon.

You fell into a hole in the ruins and lost yourself in the underground dungeon. Explore and find a way out while avoiding being caught by the terrifying beings that crawl around!

There are two endings, and your destiny is determined by whether or not you get a certain item.

ランダム生成されるダンジョンからの脱出を目指す一人称視点のホラーゲームです。「The Crawling Man」に捕まらないように注意しながら周囲を探索し、活路を見出しましょう。

エンディングは2種類あり、特定のアイテムを持っているかどうかであなたの運命が決まります。

Features
  • Simple but scary gameplay.
    It's hard to predict where the enemy will crawl, so you can always play with tension.
  • The dungeon is randomly generated each time.
    In other words, it is useless to memorize the structure, so you are always required to act flexibly.
Controls

You can play this game using your mouse and keyboard.

Mouse
  • Mouse Movement: Look around
Keyboard
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Walk
  • Shift: Sprint (Be careful as it consumes stamina)
  • Ctrl: Crouch
  • E: Pick up an  item
  • Tab: Inventory

For more details, see "How to play" in the game.

Languages

English and Japanese are available.
The language is automatically selected according to the language setting of your system.
